title: Anonymize a Source in a Draft
description: A story uses an anonymous source. An editor must ensure the draft does not contain any details that could inadvertently identify the person.

tasks.description: Read through the draft specifically looking for potentially identifying details (e.g., specific job title, exact age, location).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies all details that could compromise the source's anonymity.

tasks.description: Generalize the identifying details (e.g., change '47-year-old manager of the accounting department' to 'a senior employee in their 40s').
tasks.expected_outcome: The text is edited to protect the source.

tasks.description: Add an editor's note to the document explaining why the source was granted anonymity.
tasks.expected_outcome: A record of the ethical decision is kept with the story.
